thread.title: Tenacious D's Kyle Gass: 12 Albums That Changed My Life [News]
thread.title_full: Tenacious D's Kyle Gass: 12 Albums That Changed My Life [News]

title: Tenacious D's Kyle Gass: 12 Albums That Changed My Life [News]
text:
Posted 7 hours ago 8 
Mr. Kyle Gass of Tenacious D sat down with Music Radar to jot down a set of 12 records that had a life-changing impact on him. 
You can check out the man's picks below, consult the source for additional commentary. 1. The Beatles - Meet The Beatles! (1964) 2. Bob Dylan - Bob Dylan's Greatest Hits (1967) 3. The Beatles - The Beatles (1968) 
"Seriously, dude, I don't care if you say I'm not allowed to pick The Beatles again." 4. Neil Young - Decade (1977) 5. Peter Frampton - Frampton Comes Alive! (1976) 6. The Beach Boys - Endless Summer (1974) 7. Ted Greene - Solo Guitar (1977) 8. The Go-Go's - Beauty and the Beat (1981) 9. Hank Garland - Jazz Winds From a New Direction (1961) 10. Tenacious D - Tenacious D (2001) 11. Van Halen - Van Halen (1978) 12. Sly & The Family Stone - A Whole New Thing (1967)
